text: Middelbeers is a village in the municipality of Oirschot in the Dutch province of North Brabant. In 2021, 3,400 people lived there. Middelbeers was the capital of the municipality of Oost-, West- en Middelbeers until 1996 when it became part of the municipality of Oirschot. Category:Settlements in North Brabant
title: Middelbeers
